name: Focal Point
description:
Admire the convex and concave lenses and proceed to the next level by touching the white Rectangle. Mind your step, don't wander outside the boundaries of the world and beware the focal point!

Arrow keys - Movement

A or D - Switch between rooms (there are only 3 rooms)

F - Fullscreen

Q or Esc - Quit

Let me know what you think about this game idea!
